title: Tom Capone from Quicksand/Beyond/Bold
itunes:title: Tom Capone from Quicksand/Beyond/Bold
description:
BROUGHT TO YOU EXCLUSIVELY BY ENJOY THE RIDE RECORDS (enjoytheriderecords.com).This one is a big one for me, Tom Capone is an incredible guitarist and I was extremely excited to sit down with him for a prolonged chat about his history in and out of music, black metal and his legacy as a guitar player in his bands. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
